title: QA Meta: Prompt Corpus â€” Routing & Intent
author: Workflow QA
subject:
Routing & Intent Commands:
- Detect document type (W-9 vs non-W-9) with probability.
- If non-W-9, return {"route": "non_w9", "reason": "..."}.
- If W-9, continue extraction; else stop.
- Emit final intent label and top-3 alternatives.
- Abstain if confidence < 0.75.
creator: QA Generator v4.0

custom.prompts_core: - Provide {"intent": "w9"|"non_w9", "confidence": float}.\n- Give softmax-like scores for [w9, invoice, letter, other].
custom.prompts_guardrails: - Do not extract fields when intent != "w9".\n- Include a one-sentence rationale in `intent_reason`.
custom.eval_criteria: Correct intent > extraction speed; calibrated probabilities; clear abstain behavior.
